plain: The user's favourite genre is likely to be fiction, as most of the books listed are novels. The user's favourite pacing is likely to be a combination of fast-paced and slow-burning, as some of the books are action-packed while others are more character-driven. The user's favourite narrative structure is likely to be a combination of linear and non-linear, as some of the books follow a traditional plot while others experiment with time and structure.
